ModMetaData.name: Farming Expansion
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/iCj5o7O.png[/img]
This mod adds events and chemicals to the farmers of RimWorld.
[b]Events added[/b] [list] [*]Pests - Insects that eat up all your crops [*]Weeds - Quick growing plants that destroy your crops [/list]
[b]Chemicals added[/b] [list] [*]Pesticide (Tribal) - Prevents the Pests-event [*]Herbicide (Tribal) - Prevents the Weeds-event [*]Fungicide (Tribal) - Prevents the vanilla Blight-event [*]DDT (Industrial) - Prevents all events but lowers yeild [*]Chemical Spray (Spacer) - Prevents all events and increases yield and growthspeed [/list]
[b]Will use resources from these mods if they are loaded[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2070686241]Legacy Ark[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2007063140]VGP Garden Medicine[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2208107297]Jecs Tobacco and Cigarettes[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1550854139]Survivalist's Additions[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2069579592]RimCuisine 2: Smokes and Shrooms Expansion[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2195065488]Utility supplements[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2195469123]Apothecary[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2134308522]Vanilla Plants Expanded[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2056631665]【ZP】Rice cultivating civilization[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2167582651]VGP Garden Drinks[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1833592062]RimCuisine 2[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2069596932]RimCuisine 2: Bottling and Booze Expansion[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1543172057]CuproPanda's Drinks[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2186560858]Vanilla Brewing Expanded[/url] [/list]
Its based on StoneWolfs Pesticides-mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1261250346 and Nandonalts Pests-mod: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=29596.0
